summary:
still in bata 

adds zwiehanders,morning stars and guillotine blades
descriptionHtml:
All right ladies and gentleman, before i start on the future of this mod and the Features im trying to make a mod team to help with future and current projects so just pm if you guys are interested. Also any constructive criticism you guys have please leave in the comments.



Lore:

It\'s been two hundred years after the Oblivion Crisis, and over the years blacksmiths everywhere have begun creating new kinds of weapons with which to kill people or monsters. Or dragons...


Zwiehanders Were made by imperial blacksmiths to counter the spears reach but the downfall off these greatswords are there slow swing so you better make it count

MorningStars or for short Stars were made by the mace loving vigilant of stendarr to punish the Daedra, to spikes on these modified torcher any that it comes in contact with maces, the morning star does the same damage as other maces but has faster speed and also weighs more (had to be a negative side of them )

 guillotine blades were made by dark elfs for the speed of a dagger and the fury of a blade but scents they could only do one or the other they went with the speed (damage still pretty up there though)

Features:

These weapons range from iron to daedric, 

Adds Three new weapon types:
Zwiehanders 
morningstars
guillotine blades 

Crafting:They are not craftable yet, after all its still in its beta stages. 


location:
Npc: bandits,blacksmiths 

100% find: a barrel next to warmaiden\'s

Other:any chest or chest like containers

 

i still don\'t know how to use the creation kit as well im getting better though YEAH

Stats:

Zwiehanders:

Speed: slow
Reach: High
Power: High
Weight: High

Morning stars:

Speed: Mid
Reach: Mid
Power:Mid
Weight: Mid-High


guillotine blades

Speed:High
Reach: Mid
Power: low-Mid
Weight: Mid



in progress:
Power shot bows( double shot bows if i can get better at scripting )
Flamberges
Ultra Hammers (there going to hurt )


problems:
this is my first mod on skyrim so there are a couple problems
1. some weapons have some bad textures
2.the reach of some weapons maybe unbalancing
3.some weapons have a glitch were if up play really close in the 3rd person some parts disappear
4.in the bast some weapons have crashed my game i have fix the problem but i don\'t know how it will effect your game.
5.not all weapons have inventory images or models  
If you guys have any ideas for new weapon types or some advice on how to craft things please leave them in the comments.
author: zwiehander
